  • Method Details

    • characterTable

      private static void characterTable​(BST<java.lang.Character> tree)
      Print a formatted table of character counts and percentages in the format: 
       Character Table for Comparisons File

 Char    Count Percent
    A  206,946    8.17
    B   37,498    1.48
    ...
      Note: your data may not match this as it is file dependent.
      Parameters:
      tree - The BST to generate the table from.

    • fillTree

      private static void fillTree​(BST<java.lang.Character> tree, java.lang.String string)
      Fill a tree by inserting all letters from a string into the tree. Letters must be converted to upper-case. Non-letters are ignored. The order that letters are inserted into the tree determine its shape.
      Parameters:
      tree - The BST/AVL/PopularityTree to fill.
      string - The string to read into the tree.

    • retrieve

      private static int retrieve​(BST<java.lang.Character> tree, java.util.Scanner fileScan)
      Determine the number of comparisons to retrieve the contents of a file from a tree. Attempt to retrieve every letter in the file from tree. All letters must be converted to upper case.
      Parameters:
      tree - The BST to process.
      file - The file to process.
      Returns:
      The number of comparisons necessary to find every letter in file in tree.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if file not found.
